baseStats: Excludes attack specfic bonuses, Hyper Skill passives, Link Skills, +2 SP, Threaten - Enhance, and buffs with cooldowns
Crit Damage: [ +15% & +6% / +5% depending on weapon equipped]
Final Damage: [ +20%] [ +40%]
Knockback Resistance: [ +40%] [ +60%]
Ignore DEF: [ +30% from debuff] [ +10% when 1-hand / 2-hand blunt weapon is equipped
Abnormal Status Resistance: [ up to 10] [ +40 when shield/rosary is equipped]

buffInfo.buffCd: (120s cd), (300s cd), (120s cd)
buffInfo.buffFifth: (180s cd), (180s cd), (15s cd), (240s cd)

details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Warrior to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the quest 'Victoria Island or Bust' and choose the 'Warrior, powerful and defensive' option

Once you reach Lv. 30 as a Warrior, talk to Dances with Balrog to accept a quest called 'Way of the Page'. Completing the quest will make you a Page and you will be on the path to a Paladin. Page is the 2nd job of Paladin

build: -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Blast - Extra Strike and Reinforce
  • Threaten - Enhance and Opportunity
  • Heaven's Hammer - Cooldown Cutter

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Slash Blast
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 6, Damage: 335%, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Slash forward at multiple enemies

primary.name: War Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Leap Attack
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, Damage: 90%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Dive downwards towards nearby platforms below
details: Can only be used while in the air
Can also be activated by pressing the Down Arrow Key and Attack Key together
Pressing also the Left or Right Arrow Key will dive towards the pressed direction

primary.name: Iron Body
primary.shortDesc: DEF: +200, Max HP: +20%, Damage Taken: -10%

primary.name: Warrior Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Speed: 10, Jump: 10, Max Speed: 10, Max HP Per Level: 20, Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Flame Charge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30. Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 140%, Number of Attacks: 3. 90% chance, to deal 75% Fire Damage over 6 sec
primary.desc: Attack forward dealing fire damage and inflicting a damaging burn debuff

primary.name: Blizzard Charge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30. Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 140%, Number of Attacks: 3. 90% chance to reduce enemy's movement speed for 6 sec. When attacking a burning enemy, deals 115% additional damage
primary.desc: Attack forward dealing ice damage and slowing enemies
details: Attacking enemies taking burn damage will increased damage

primary.name: Elemental Charge
primary.shortDesc: If you use a different Charge skill right after using a Charge skill, you will gain 1 Elemental Charge for 30 sec. You can hold up to 5 Elemental Charges at any one time. [Effects Per Charge] Recovery amount +2% (excluding damage and Potions), Attack Power +8, Status Resistance +2, hit damage -2% (including the damage proportional to max HP).
primary.desc: Using a Charge skill of a different element will grant 1 Elemental Charge (up to 5)
details:
Each stack increases %Recovery amount, Abnormal Status Resistance, and %Damage Reduction and grants flat Attack
  • Damage Reduction also reduces %Max HP attacks

Paladins have four Charge skills:
  • Flame Charge (2nd Job)
  • Blizzard Charge (2nd Job)
  • Lightning Charge (3rd Job)
  • Divine Charge (4th Job)

primary.name: Close Combat
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20. Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 125%, Number of Attacks: 2). 80% chance to stun enemies for 4 sec after drawing them toward you.
primary.desc: Pulls in enemies from both sides of you with a chance to stun

primary.name: Weapon Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Weapon's Attack Speed increased for 200 sec
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Weapon Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Sword and Blunt Weapon Mastery: +50%, Attack Speed: +1

primary.name: Final Attack
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Grant a 40% chance to deal 80% Final Attack damage 2 time(s).
primary.desc: Grants your attacks a chance to deal an additional hit

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Lightning Charge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35. Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 250%, Number of Attacks: 3. Stun Chance: 90%, Duration: 6 sec. Damage Over Time: 115% damage against enemies that are not stunned. Attack slowed enemies with Blizzard Charge to deal 115% more damage
primary.desc: Attack forward dealing lightning damage and stunning enemies
details: Attacking slowed enemies will deal increased damage

primary.name: HP Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40. Instantly recovers 50% of Max HP. If used repeatedly within 15 sec, recovery amount decreases by 10%, Minimum HP recovery amount 10%

primary.name: Rush
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 305%, Max Enemies Pushed: 12
primary.desc: Dash forward while pushing enemies back

primary.name: Threaten
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Success Rate: 75%, Number of Enemies: 6, Enemy Attack and Defense: 30% for 80 sec, Accuracy: -30%, Duration (Accuracy): 8 sec
primary.desc: Debuffs enemies by reducing their %Attack, %DEF and %Accuracy

primary.name: Upward Charge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 300%.
primary.desc: Launch up into the air
details:
Can also be activated by pressing the Up Arrow Key and Attack Key together
  • Right-clicking the skill will lock it, preventing input activation

primary.name: Parashock Guard
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 32, Guard Chance: -20%, DEF: -20%, When nearby party members are hit (except yourself): Damage -20% and Guard Chance +20% , your Attack Power +20
primary.desc: While active, reduces your %Guard Chance and %DEF but grants a buff to nearby party members
details: [Passive]: Permanently grants flat attack for yourself
Party members gain increased %Damage Reduction (against regular monsters) and a chance to guard themselves

primary.name: Combat Orders
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 36, All Skills: +2 Levels, Duration: 200\n[Passive Effect: Blizzard Charge and Flame Charge Damage: +110%]
primary.desc: Temporarily grants bonus skill levels to skills of all party members
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage to
[Exception]: Beginner skills, Combat Orders, Hyper Skills and 5th Job Skills

primary.name: Shield Mastery
primary.shortDesc: When shield or rosary is equipped - Abnormal Status Resistance: +40, Elemental Resistance: +40%, Defense: +250%, Attack Power: +10, Guard Chance: 40%, Stun Chance on Guard: 60%

primary.name: Achilles
primary.shortDesc: Damage Taken: -30%

primary.name: Divine Shield
primary.shortDesc: Shield Chance (when hit): 50%, For 90 sec, Attack Power: +20, Enemy Blows Blocked: 10, Damage -25% only for attacks that inflict damage at a certain ratio of the max HP,\nUnable to recreate Protective Shield for 30 sec once activated.
primary.desc: Creates a shield when hit that absorbs attacks and increases your Attack
details: For attacks that deal Max HP damage, reduces amount taken by a percentage

primary.name: Blast
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Number of Attacks: 9, Damage: 285%
primary.desc: Strike forward against a single enemy while applying the element of the most recently used Charge Skill

primary.name: Divine Charge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45. Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 454%, Number of Attacks: 3. 100% chance to silence enemies for 10 sec. Attacking Stunned enemies with Lightning Charge inflicts 120% additional damage.
primary.desc: Attack forward dealing holy damage and silencing enemies
details: Attacking stunned enemies will deal increased damage

primary.name: Magic Crash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Success Rate: 100%, Buff Block Duration: 22 sec\nCooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Removes buffs on nearby enemies and prevents them from casting new buffs

primary.name: Heaven's Hammer
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Damage: 570%, Number of Attacks: 8, to 15 enemies, damage increased by 30% when attacking a boss\nCooldown: 15 sec
primary.desc: Slams a hammer damaging nearby enemies in a large area
details: You are not affected by knockbacks while casting
Deals increased %Damage towards bosses

primary.name: Elemental Force
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Final Damage: +20%, Duration: 200 sec\n[Passive Effect: Damage +204%p for Flame Charge, Blizzard Charge, and Lightning Charge]

primary.name: Power Stance
primary.shortDesc: Knockback Resistance: +60%.

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Guardian
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 50 MP to revive your closest party member and grant both yourself and them invincibility for 10 sec.\nCooldown: 600 sec
primary.desc: Revives one party member closest to you and causes both you and your party member to become invulnerable for a short time
details: Still consumes a Death Count for bosses even if revived but buffs are kept

primary.name: High Paladin
primary.shortDesc:
Mastery: +70%, DEF: +400, Critical Rate: +40%, Critical Damage: +15%, DEF Ignored: +30%, Final Damage: +40%
Critical Damage +6% and Mastery +3% when equipped with a One-Handed Sword
Critical Damage +5% when equipped with a Two-Handed Sword
Critical Damage +5%, DEF Ignored +10%, and Mastery +3% when equipped with a One-Handed Blunt weapon
Critical Damage +5% and DEF Ignored +10% when equipped with a Two-Handed Blunt weapon
primary.desc: Increases %Weapon Mastery, %Crit Rate, %Crit Damage, %Ignore DEF, and %Final Damage and grants flat DEF
details: Depending on the weapon equipped, gain additional %Critical Damage, %Ignore DEF and %Weapon Mastery

primary.name: Advanced Charge
primary.shortDesc: Damage Per Charge: 5%, Attack Power: increase up to 12, Charge Skills' Max Number of Targets: +2, Blast and Charge Skill's Attack Count: +2,
details: For each charge of , increases %Damage and grants flat Attack
Additionally increases the max number of enemies hit and number of hits per attack of and Charge Skills

hyperPassive.name: Threaten - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Enemy Attack Power/DEF: --20%, Accuracy: -20% Duration: 8 sec

hyperPassive.name: Heaven's Hammer - Extra Strike
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Number of Attacks vs. Boss Monsters: +2

hyperActive.name: Sacrosanctity
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 600, Invincibility Duration: 30 sec. When the skill ends, Paladin's cooldown is reduced by 45 sec for every 5 sec of remaining duration.\nCooldown: 300 sec
details:
Pressing the Skill Key again will end the buff early
  • The cooldown is reduced depending on the remaining duration

hyperActive.name: Smite Shield
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 400, Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 6, Stun Duration: 10 sec.\nStun Duration: +100% depending on damage inflicted with Smite Shield.\nCooldown: 120 sec
hyperActive.desc: Binds nearby enemies and removes buffs to enemies hit

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Explorer class in the party

fifthMain.name: Divine Echo
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: MP 1000, Duration: 65 sec., Final Damage: +47%\nEchoing Party Member - Upon using an offensive skill, the affected party member mimics you for 37% of Final Damage. Buff Duration on Party Member: 62% + 1% for every 1000 Strength (up to 100%)\nCooldown: 120 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Targets a party member in range who will duplicate any attack skills and certain buffs you use
details: Increases %Final Damage when Divine Echo is active

Buffs gained from Divine Echo have a shorter duration
  • The duration is based on a fixed amount + 1% for every 1000 STR up to 100%
Pressing the Down Arrow Key along with the Skill Key while the skill is active, you can select a party member to echo by pressing the corresponding number key (with regard to the party UI)

fifthMain.name: Hammers of the Righteous
fifthMain.shortDesc:
[Passive Effects] Creates 1 spiraling hammer around you whenever you generate an Elemental Charge. Up to 5 can be active at once, and their duration is shared with Elemental Charge.
Hammers automatically attack up to 4 enemies 2 times dealing 500% damage. Attack speed increases with the number of hammers.
[Active Effects] MP Cost: 1000, Augments Hammers of the Righteous for 30 sec.
Augmented Hammers - Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Hits: 3, Damage: 1050% damage.
Cooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: Passively creates a damaging hammer that circles around you when you use a Charge attack (up to 5 hammers)
details: Hammers automatically hit enemies and will gain attack speed based on the number of hammers active
[Active]: Hammers grow in size and spin faster while dealing more damage
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Grand Guardian
fifthMain.shortDesc:
HP Cost: 5000. After that, consumes 1.5% of max HP per sec. Deals 350% damage 12 times consecutively on up to 12 enemies during key-down.
The cross gets bigger after some time passes, which will increase attack speed and deal 600% damage.
Max Key-down Time: 10 sec, Additional Critical Rate: +100%, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +100%
Damage Reduction During Key-down: 50% (including Percentage HP attacks)
Cooldown: 150 sec
fifthMain.desc: While held, creates a cross that deals damage and slowly grows bigger which will increase attack speed and %Damage
details: Consumes %Max HP however, increases %Damage Reduction (including %Max HP attacks) while casting
You can move while casting and will not be knocked back or stunned by enemies
Attack has 100% Ignore DEF and is a guaranteed Critical Hit

fifthMain.name: Mighty Mjolnir
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500, sets 1 enemy as the target and deals 450% damage 6 time(s). Additional Critical Rate: 50%. Tracks down a total of 4 enemies as targets, including the first attack.
A shockwave occurs after attacking the tracked target, dealing additional attacks up to 6 enemies, with 500% damage, 9 time(s).
1 Hammer will be prepared every 15 sec, and you can hold up to 2.
Cooldown: 2.5 sec
fifthMain.desc: Throws a mighty hammer that travels towards enemies while targeting the enemy with the highest Max HP
details: The hammer has increased %Crit Chance and creates a shockwave when it hits a target that damages nearby enemies
You can control the direction of where the hammer is thrown by pressing the Skill Key and any Arrow Key
You gain one hammer every 15 secs and can store up to 2 at a time
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

meta: Paladin is a STR warrior class part of the Explorers. This class is known for its support and tank capabilities.
